# Introduction

## Tangent and Secant
A **tangent** line just touches a curve at a point, matching the curve's slope there.
A **secant** line intersects two or more points on a curve. See figure \@ref(fig:secant) 

```{r secant, echo=FALSE,fig.cap='A secant and Tangent',out.width="80%", fig.align='center'}
knitr::include_graphics(rep("images/secant.png"))
```
